alignerTypes.description: World's most advanced clear aligner system with proven results
High-quality clear aligners offering excellent value and results
Fast-track aligners for minor corrections and touch-ups

treatmentSteps.title: Initial Consultation
treatmentSteps.description: 3D scan and assessment to determine if aligners are suitable for you

treatmentSteps.title: Treatment Planning
treatmentSteps.description: Custom 3D treatment plan showing your week-by-week progress

treatmentSteps.title: Aligner Creation
treatmentSteps.description: Your custom aligners are precisely manufactured for your unique smile

treatmentSteps.title: Active Treatment
treatmentSteps.description: Wear aligners 20-22 hours daily, changing every 1-2 weeks

treatmentSteps.title: Retention Phase
treatmentSteps.description: Retainers maintain your new smile position permanently

benefits: Virtually invisible - no one will know you're straightening your teeth
Removable for eating, drinking, and special occasions
More comfortable than traditional braces with no metal or wires
Better oral hygiene - brush and floss normally
Shorter treatment time compared to conventional braces
